snippet: On Dec. 6, 1992, the destruction of the Babri Masjid mosque by Hindu extremists killed hundreds of Hindus and Muslims. In a truly secular nation, what happened next would have been different.
abstract: On Dec. 6, 1992, the destruction of the Babri Masjid mosque by Hindu extremists killed hundreds of Hindus and Muslims. In a truly secular nation, what happened next would have been different.

headline.main: India Is Not a Secular Republic
